mapper.select: SELECT b.brd_num, b.title, u.nick, b.reg_date, b.conts, b.view_cnt, b.user_num, b.brd_md, b.img, b.reg_date, b.brd_group, b.brd_step FROM board b, user1 u Where brd_num = #{brd_num} AND b.user_num = u.user_num
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board (brd_num, brd_lg, brd_md, title, conts, reg_date, user_num, brd_group, brd_step, view_cnt, img) VALUES (brd_num_seq.nextval, 400, #{brd_md}, #{title}, #{conts}, sysdate + interval '9' hour, #{user_num}, brd_num_seq.currval, 0, 0, #{img})
